overview: Eight young guys in wild hard-action scenes. Great looking blonds getting it on together. Compilation of five short films from the Filmco and Starline vaults. Includes the films: Blond Sex Buddies, Blond Lovers, Get It On (a.k.a. Tasting Bob, a.k.a. Young Fantasies), Tony And Bill (a.k.a. Take All You Can), and a Matt Bradley solo scene.
title: Blond Lovers
